job_tasks.phrase: mastering the art of prompt engineering
job_tasks.justification: Prompt engineering is a core component of working with and adapting generative models.
This implies adapting and applying new generative AI techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: suggest AI solutions to our clients
job_tasks.justification: Proposing AI solutions involves understanding and applying modeling capabilities.
Understanding content strategy is crucial for aligning AI solutions with business goals.
Analyzing the customer journey is a business-focused activity.
This phrase highlights a focus on business outcomes and user understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: You are one of the first to pitch ideas.
How much time can we save using a specific tool?
create (and supervise the creation of) high-quality copy
suggest AI solutions to our clients

classification.rationale: The role focuses heavily on prompt engineering and suggesting AI solutions but lacks depth in core Generative AI engineering tasks like fine-tuning, RAG system building, or productionizing complex AI applications. It leans more towards content creation and AI tool utilization for marketing purposes.
